name: LudumDare 47
description:
You are a repair-bot on the space station Bublik, and your day consists of all the tasks needed to maintain the station. Normally, your humans tell you what to do, but lately the only one giving you instructions has been the station’s AI, RED.

Bublik is a puzzle-platformer with a looping theme, with a real story that you will need to work for to experience fully!

[NOTE: Some people have had trouble with the UI in full-screen mode or with certain screens. Oops. We'll upload a post-jam version with fixed UI at a later point, and link it here!]

Made for Ludum Dare 47 in 72 hours. Vote for the game here:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/bublik
